General.Name: Cikarang Listrindo Tbk PT
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: PT Cikarang Listrindo Tbk engages in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electric power in Indonesia. The company owns and operates gas and coal power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,144MW; transmission system of 150 kV; and distribution line of 20kV. It serves approximately 2,595 customers in five industrial estates, including manufacturers in the automotive, electronics, plastic, food, metal, chemical, and data centers sectors. PT Cikarang Listrindo Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

1.Name: Mr. Christanto  Pranata
